get.summary: gets the item of the user

put.summary: updates an external link for the user

delete.summary: deletes an item for the user

patch.summary: patches an external link for the user

put.summary: updates the position of the item for the user
updates the paarent of the item for the user
updates the position of the item
updates the paarent of the item

get.summary: list the external links of the user

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: unpaged
parameters.description: Flag to return the results unpaged.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Parameter to specify a search query.

post.summary: creates an external link for the user

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: unpaged
parameters.description: Flag to return the results unpaged.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Parameter to specify a search query.

get.summary: list the children of an item of the user
list the root items of the user
